home.title:
Seedlings that bring 
abundant harvests and 
a secure future!
home.heading: Built on tradition, for a more successful future
home.desc: The agricultural cooperative “Euro duo kalem” was founded on decades-long traditions of cultivating planting material. Our primary activity is the production of fruit tree seedlings, grafted grapevines, and rose seedlings. We achieve virus-free seedling production thanks to favorable climatic conditions, the use of modern technology, and continuous cooperation with leading institutes from Serbia and abroad. The modern design and top quality of our products are recognized in many countries across Europe and Asia. Join us on our journey toward a fruitful future.

mostWanted.title: Discover our most sought-after fruit tree seedlings

pear.title: pear
pear.text: Our pear seedlings yield abundant harvests and are adapted to various climatic conditions. The varieties we offer are known for their excellent balance of sweetness and freshness, making them perfect for both fresh consumption and processing...

apple.title: apple
apple.text: Quality apple seedlings with rich flavor and long shelf life, ideal for all types of production. We offer early, medium, and late varieties, tailored to the different needs of fruit growers and the market...

plum.title: plum
plum.text: Resistant and fruitful plum varieties, perfect for fresh consumption, drying, or processing. Our seedlings guarantee high yields and stable fruit quality, with exceptional adaptability to soil and climate...

sour-cherry.title: sour cherry
sour-cherry.text: Cherries with rich flavor, perfect for processing, juices, and jams, with stable yields. Our seedlings are resistant to diseases and adapted to various growing conditions, providing a secure and high-quality harvest...

sweet-cherry.title: sweet cherry
sweet-cherry.text: Sweet and juicy cherries from our orchards, known for their exceptional size and flavor. Selected varieties with excellent pollination and high yields ensure long-lasting and high-quality crops...

seedlings: 15+ varieties of fruit tree seedlings - A wide assortment of seedlings adapted to various climatic conditions and the needs of farmers.
Export to 20+ countries - Our seedlings are recognized in both domestic and international markets, with a high standard of quality.
Traditional production with modern methods - A combination of years of experience and modern technology ensures top-quality seedlings.
Certified quality - All seedlings are produced in accordance with the highest standards, with regular health and quality checks.
Fast and secure delivery - We provide reliable delivery to ensure that the seedlings arrive in perfect condition.
Expert support and advisory services - We provide advice on planting, care, and cultivation to help you achieve maximum yield.
home.message: Don’t just plant fruit, plant the future - top-quality seedlings for orchards that last for generations!

contact.title: Contact us
contact.name: Full name
contact.callUsText: Our team is here to provide professional advice and help you choose the ideal fruit seedlings for your business. Feel free to contact us with any questions or orders.
contact.sendEmailText: Have questions about our fruit seedlings or want to place a bulk order? Write to us — we’ll be happy to respond and send you an offer as soon as possible.
contact.visitUsText: Come to our location and see the quality of our fruit seedlings firsthand. We’ll gladly show you the range, offer expert advice, and arrange the best deal for your needs.

aboutUs.title: Who We Are, and What Makes Us Different
aboutUs.text: We specialize in high-quality fruit seedlings, grown with care and expertise, to help you build orchards that last for generations.

home.title: Euro duo kalem | Fruite seedlings
home.description: High-quality fruit tree seedlings from Serbia - apples, pears, plums, sour cherries, hazelnuts, and other varieties suitable for consumption, processing, and export. Our seedlings are certified, virus-free, and available for delivery across Europe, Russia, and worldwide. Contact us for a professional offer and collaboration.

seedlings.title: Seedling Offer
seedlings.description: Explore our extensive selection of fruit tree seedlings: apples, pears, plums, apricots, peaches, and other varieties suitable for consumption, processing, and export. All seedlings are high-quality, certified, and available for delivery across Europe, Russia, and worldwide.
